name: Tabard Cocktail
description: A tequila, sherry and Drambuie concoction with orange bitters and a garnish of orange peel and thyme.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 ounce dry amontillado sherry, preferably Los Arcos from Lustau
2 dashes Regan’s bitters, or other orange bitters
Twist of orange peel, for garnish
Small sprig of fresh thyme, for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: In a cocktail shaker, combine the tequila, sherry, Drambuie and bitters.
Fill shaker with ice, shake well and strain mixture into a chilled cocktail glass. Float the orange peel on top like a boat (adding ice to glass may help), and place the thyme in the center.
